00122         public function dispatchController()
00123         {
00124         if (method_exists($this->controller, $this->router->getMethodName())) {
00125             call_user_func(array($this->controller, $this->router->getMethodName()));
00126         } else {
00127             showHtmlMessage("Dispatcher Failure", "Action \"{$this->router->getMethodName()}\" is not defined", TRUE);
00128         }
